definitions.text: a lump on the body caused by a blow
something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from its surroundings
examples: the gun in his pocket made an obvious bulge
he stood on the rocky prominence
the occipital protuberance was well developed
the bony excrescence between its horns
the bump threw him off the bicycle

definitions.text: knock against with force or violence
examples: My car bumped into the tree

definitions.text: come upon, as if by accident; meet with
examples: We find this idea in Plato
I happened upon the most wonderful bakery not very far from here
She chanced upon an interesting book in the bookstore the other day

definitions.text: dance erotically or dance with the pelvis thrust forward
assign to a lower position; reduce in rank
examples: She was demoted because she always speaks up
He was broken down to Sergeant

definitions.text: remove or force from a position of dwelling previously occupied
examples: The new employee dislodged her by moving into her office space
